sn16.12:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā ca mahākassapo āyasmā ca sāriputto bārāṇasiyaṁ viharanti isipatane migadāye.
sn16.12:1.2: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā mahākassapo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā mahākassapena saddhiṁ sammodi.
sn16.12:1.3: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṁ mahākassapaṁ etadavoca:
sn16.12:1.4: “kiṁ nu kho, āvuso kassapa, hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti?
sn16.12:1.7: “Kiṁ panāvuso, na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti?
sn16.12:1.10: “Kiṁ nu kho, āvuso, hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti?
sn16.12:1.12: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’”ti.
sn16.12:1.13: “Kiṁ panāvuso, neva hoti, na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti?
sn16.12:1.15: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’”ti.
sn16.12:1.17: “Na hetaṁ, āvuso, atthasaṁhitaṁ nādibrahmacariyakaṁ na nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya na upasamāya na abhiññāya na sambodhāya na nibbānāya saṁvattati.
sn16.12:2.7: “Etañhi, āvuso, atthasaṁhitaṁ etaṁ ādibrahmacariyakaṁ etaṁ nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
